creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue linen pleated top section narrow self ties; lower section attached with tiny accordian pleats in printed blue indigo batik; occasional pink cross stitch embroidered highlights; horizontal bands of tape and small diamond patches in green, pinks and white; pleats held in place with gathering thread; on PR approx 7" of woven tape at bottom edge
title: Skirt
